title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Ridiculous Reanimate Mythic, Uncounterable Land, Zurgo Returns!  Tarkir Dragonstorm MTG Spoilers
videos.description:
We've reached day three of Tarkir: Dragonstorm spoilerse, and today we get one of the most ridiculous reanimation spells ever printed, a cycle of strong utility lands, the return of Zurgo and so much more! Let's discuss!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

More spoilers: https://www.mtgpreviews.com

0:00 Start
1:00 Perennation
6:48 Severance Priest
12:31 Rare Utility Lands
22:41 Zurgo
25:33 The New Way
31:05 Commons and Uncommons

#MTG #magicthegathering #mtgtarkir #mtgspoilers

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: I Reanimate Every Vehicle, and Then They Crash  Against the Odds
videos.description:
Can Push the Limit and a bunch of janky cycling Vehicles make for a Living End–style deck in Standard? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/against-the-odds-push-the-limit-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/6965018#paper
